overview: Orfeo and Qays are two poets of legend who celebrate love and unity through music. Their songs resonate from East to West and back.  An ancient Greek myth intertwines with an oriental love story; Orfeo & Majnun is an intercultural and interdisciplinary project. It includes a parade in the streets of Aix-en-Provence with animal puppets and a performance streamed live on OperaVision from Aixâ€™s famous Cours Mirabeau.
title: Orfeo & Majnun
